body: will there be a second part? I liked the story, I hope it's good for the MC

I'm pretty sure me saying anything now is pointless but here we go. Meiko's been cheating with Baki-boy for a while now and she's been using excuses as to why she didn't cheat on Keiichi. Baki-boy mention walking home almost everyday with Meiko which implies that they probably have been doing it for a while and she's been lying about it. Meiko said she was staying at a female coworker and yet she wasn't, she also said sex didn't happen cause she was drunk meaning that it did happen and she's using that as an excuse. Even at the end Meiko says that she's not cheating cause it was lunchbreak, so as long as something seems off for her it will probably be nullified and not be considered cheating in her eyes.
Guys read the English version, cause it seems like my is going to heartlessly dump her when she gets pregnant.

Now this is a REAL slut. A girlfriend who has no ill intention towards you, yet gets away with all the horribly wrong things she's doing to you without a dent in her conscience by an unwitting lack of respect for an unfathomable something in her morals, which begets careless decision-making when, for innocent reasons, being with whomever the male partner is while not intending to cheat, nevertheless ultimately doing so. It's all the more frustrating for the male partner when she reveals this nature of herself at an unexpected and precarious time in which you happen to find it hard to hold your temper and if she holds a security against you of a promise you made unwittingly and silently. It's not like I think I ever met a true slut, but I somehow know by wisdom that I naturally got. In this manga/doujin, the male seems to decide to continue loving her despite the girl not having any mysterious security against him, so his decision to be with her probably comes from true love.

If what Ehbm said was true then this cuck should've break up with her. Even if the first time was due to being drunk then she should've stopped meeting Baki-boy as there's nothing to blackmail her for as the cuck knew as Baki-boy told him straight to his face but why did he didn't? even love has its limit. She doesn't really love him and just using his money to live in comfort.

She didn't get raped, did she? She just got drunk the first time and had sex with him. She said it didn't count since she was drunk. That's what I got from Google translate. Then she says she let him cum inside her because it felt good so that's different, doesn't count either. She then lol says he can't move out because she can't pay the rent alone. Lol

I prefer Cheating/NTR with Revenge/Payback afterwards. The husband/SO getting revenge or justice. That sort of shit.
